segments.text: The bartender just gave the last call . Let's order another round , okay ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , but let's get a pitcher this time We should be able to down it before they close .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds good . You order the beer while I go to the bathroom . Where is the can in this place ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's all the way to the back . See that yellow door ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . I think I can find it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're back already . That sure was quick .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's because I just took one step inside and turned right around . That bathroom is too gross for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the bartender wouldn't give me the pitcher of beer . Anyway . He said it was too close to closing time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's leave then . I could take some fresh air , anyway .
segments.speaker: S1
